title: Withheld
description: A dying village, once a city, besieged by troops and beset by a disease that dwindles their number every year. Ostracia and all its horrors cannot be allowed to return to the world.A girl with powers she does not want. A father desperate to protect her. A love, lost. The last Outsider in Ostracia doesn't know she holds the fate of them all in her hands.A fantasy novel both for those who read fantasy and those who do not. This is an apocalypse not of worlds and kingdoms, but of individual lives and those they touch.
author: Mr Matt Corton
